'''Microsoft Security Essentials''' ([[List of Microsoft codenames|codenamed]] '''Morro''') is an upcoming gratis [[antivirus software]] created by [[Microsoft]] that will provide protection from [[Computer virus|viruses]], [[spyware]], [[rootkit]]s, and [[Trojan horse (computing)|trojans]] for Windows XP, Windows Vista, and Windows 7.<ref name="nocostsecuritypr">{{cite press release
